timeline.message: added since model property to new condfiguration parameter
fixed extension model in special cases

timeline.author: elrodro83
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -900,7 +906,12 @@ private void declareConfiguration(ExtensionDeclarer extensionDeclarer, ClassType
         .withOptionalParameter("defaultObjectSerializer-ref")
         .ofType(typeLoader.load(String.class))
         .withExpressionSupport(NOT_SUPPORTED)
-        .describedAs("An optional reference to an ObjectSerializer to be used as the application's default");
+        .describedAs("An optional reference to an ObjectSerializer to be used as the application's default")
+            .withDsl(ParameterDslConfiguration.builder()
+                             .allowsReferences(true)
+                             .allowsInlineDefinition(false)
+                             .allowTopLevelDefinition(true)
+                             .build());;

timeline.author: elrodro83
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -900,7 +906,12 @@ private void declareConfiguration(ExtensionDeclarer extensionDeclarer, ClassType
         .withOptionalParameter("defaultObjectSerializer-ref")
         .ofType(typeLoader.load(String.class))
         .withExpressionSupport(NOT_SUPPORTED)
-        .describedAs("An optional reference to an ObjectSerializer to be used as the application's default");

timeline.author: elrodro83
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -864,14 +864,20 @@ private void declareConfiguration(ExtensionDeclarer extensionDeclarer, ClassType
         .ofType(typeLoader.load(String.class))
         .withExpressionSupport(NOT_SUPPORTED)
         .withAllowedStereotypes(singletonList(ERROR_HANDLER))
-        .describedAs("The default error handler for every flow. This must be a reference to a global error handler.");
+        .describedAs("The default error handler for every flow. This must be a reference to a global error handler.")
+    .withDsl(ParameterDslConfiguration.builder()
+                     .allowsReferences(true)
+                     .allowsInlineDefinition(false)
+                     .allowTopLevelDefinition(true)
